title: Classic UI | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.1 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.1 Modules Client schema Controls Sandbox WebSocket Data operations (front-end) JS classes reference
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.1**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/category/classic-ui)** (8.3).
